title: Radiant Diamond Kada - Contemporary Kangan for Everyday Elegance
features: Sleek and modern line bangle design featuring alternating floral motifs and brilliant-cut diamonds in prong settings. The streamlined design and flexible construction ensure a comfortable fit. Features a subtle, polished finish that enhances the diamonds' brilliance.
colors: Warm yellow gold and sparkling white diamonds create a classic and elegant contrast.
occasions: or as a sophisticated addition to festive ensembles. These kadas are suitable for gifting during special occasions like Diwali
description: A perfect blend of tradition and contemporary style, this diamond line kada is lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear. The 22 Karat gold provides lasting value, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine. The prong set diamonds maximize brilliance, creating a dazzling effect.
